snippet.title: Asgard's Fall - Official Gameplay Trailer | Publisher Spotlight 2024 (Assemble Entertainment)
snippet.description: Here's your look at gameplay from Asgard's Fall in this trailer for the upcoming Norse Survivors-like roguelite game. A free prologue for Asgard's Fall is available now on Steam. In Asgard's Fall, fight your way through hordes of creatures and let the gods feel your relentless wrath. How will your saga unfold?
